title: swaamy unRan charaNam
sahitya:
swaami unRan caraNam caraNam

saadulOgabaalaka asaadujana kaala akaNida anandaleelabala



anupallavi



boomi maadum taamaraimalar meeduRai

pon maDandaiyoDu neeLaiyennumoru

minmaDandaiyum purinda perundava



caraNam



shree manO haranE sundaranE
